name: Neon Square: Uprising
description:
Use your map to navigate through a maze of platforming challenges, enemies, and bosses. Collect upgrades that will aid you in traversing obstacles and cutting down foes. Do you have the wits and reflexes needed to escape from this hostile maze?

Created for Metroidvania Month 19.

Keyboard and Gamepad control options can be found inside the game's pause menu.
